mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.module AS "module", a.title AS "title", a.term_year AS "termYear", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.message AS "message", a.description AS "description", a.tip AS "tip", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_config( id, module, title, term_year, start_date, end_date, message, description, tip, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{module}, #{title}, #{termYear}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{message}, #{description}, #{tip}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_config SET module = #{module}, title = #{title}, term_year = #{termYear}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, message = #{message}, description = #{description}, tip = #{tip}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
